name: congou
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of black tea from China: The class of tea most in request for England is Congou. There is a fine selection of popular and exotic teas, including rose congou and lychee. The cup was made of fine porcelain, and it was filled with Congou tea.
More examplesFewer examples When infused for five minutes in boiling water, congou tea has a fine, rich, mellow flavour.You may notice a greenness in the leaves of Congou and Souchong teas.
